bibl.title: 'The God who Drowned the King of Egypt': A Short Note on an Exorcistic Formula.
bibl.note: Refers to exorcistic formulas in the P.G.M.

bibl.title: The Wisdom of Egypt. Jewish, Early Christian and Gnostic Essays in Honour of Gerard P. Luttikhuizen

bibl.seg: VAN DER HORST Pieter W., 'The God who Drowned the King of Egypt': A Short Note on an Exorcistic Formula.

Anthony HILHORST and George H. VAN KOOTEN (Edd.), The Wisdom of Egypt. Jewish, Early Christian and Gnostic Essays in Honour of Gerard P. Luttikhuizen = Ancient Judaism and Early Christianity. 59 (Leiden - Boston, 2005) pp. 135-139.
Refers to exorcistic formulas in the P.G.M.
